npc.title: npc
npc.description: NPC's name. Will be the NPC's display_name if that is not specified. Any characters except a-zA-Z0-9 will be stripped to create a condensed name to use with /interactnpc

display_name.title: display_name
display_name.description: NPC's name as displayed in chat messages sent from the NPC. Can contain spaces and technically colors, though use of colors is discouraged here.

entity_type.title: entity_type
entity_type.description: Bukkit/Spigot EntityType. Can be any of these choices: VILLAGER (default), ARMOR_STAND, BAT, BLAZE, CAVE_SPIDER, CHICKEN, COW, CREEPER, DONKEY, ELDER_GUARDIAN, ENDER_DRAGON, ENDERMAN, ENDERMITE, EVOKER, GHAST, GIANT, GUARDIAN, HORSE, HUSK, ILLUSIONER, IRON_GOLEM, LLAMA, MAGMA_CUBE, MULE, MUSHROOM_COW, OCELOT, PARROT, PIG, PIG_ZOMBIE, POLAR_BEAR, RABBIT, SHEEP, SHULKER, SILVERFISH, SKELETON, SKELETON_HORSE, SLIME, SNOWMAN, SPIDER, SQUID, STRAY, VEX, VINDICATOR, WITCH, WITHER, WITHER_SKELETON, WOLF, ZOMBIE, ZOMBIE_HORSE, ZOMBIE_VILLAGER

file_prerequisites.title: file_prerequisites
file_prerequisites.description:
Prerequisites for this NPC file. If these prerequisites exist and are not met, none of the quest actions in this file will execute, and the visibility_prerequisites in this file won't be checked.
You might want to use use_npc_for_prereqs for these prerequisites.

quest_components.title: quest_components
quest_components.description: A list of actions with associated prerequisites

visibility_prerequisites.title: visibility_prerequisites
visibility_prerequisites.description: Prerequisites for the NPC to appear to a player. This is checked often, so should preferably be relatively simple (try not using items_in_inventory checks) - note that 'file_prerequisites' is checked together with this, so that should also be kept simple. Players in creative or spectator mode will always see all NPCs. An entity with such a prerequisite must not be riding another entity or have passengers itself.
